title: Unsung Heroes: Charles Planet on Getting over His Fear in the Peloton after Life-Threatening Crash
content:
Planet is one of Novo Nordisk's most recognizable riders but he's been struggling with fear in the bunch after he was hit by a driver while training in 2022.

Read the full article at Unsung Heroes: Charles Planet on Getting over His Fear in the Peloton after Life-Threatening Crash on Velo.
